mcq.statement: Choose the sentence with correct subject-verb agreement? Either the cat or the dog were responsible for the mess, Either the cat or the dog was responsible for the mess, Either the cats or the dog were responsible for the mess

options.a: Either the cat or the dog were responsible for the mess
options.b: Either the cat or the dog was responsible for the mess
options.c: Either the cats or the dog were responsible for the mess
options.d: Either the cats or the dog was responsible for the mess
